languages.text: "В ваше отсутствие мне пришлось временно заступить на место управляющего протекторатом. Я избрал нашей точкой пребывания Футфол, куда стекаются все сплетни Простора. Мои агенты искали любые упоминания Вашей Светлости, которые могли бы указать нам цель для проведения спасательной экспедиции. С большим облегчением слагаю с себя полномочия командования и возвращаю их вам, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "В ваше отсутствие мне пришлось временно заступить на место управляющего протекторатом. Я избрал нашей точкой пребывания Футфол, куда стекаются все сплетни Простора. Мои агенты искали любые упоминания Вашей Светлости, которые могли бы указать нам цель для проведения спасательной экспедиции. С большим облегчением слагаю с себя полномочия командования и возвращаю их вам, Лорд-капитан".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "In your absence, I had to temporarily assume stewardship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our base of operations, as gossip from across the Expanse finds its way there. My agents searched for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "В ваше отсутствие мне пришлось временно заступить на место управляющего протекторатом. Я избрал нашей точкой пребывания Футфол, куда стекаются все сплетни Простора. Мои агенты искали любые упоминания Вашей Светлости, которые могли бы указать нам цель для проведения спасательной экспедиции. С большим облегчением слагаю с себя полномочия командования и возвращаю их вам, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "While you were absent, I had to temporarily assume governorship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our location, since it absorbs gossip from all over the Expanse. My agents looked for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and hand it back to you, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "In your absence, I had to temporarily assume stewardship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our base of operations, as gossip from across the Expanse finds its way there. My agents searched for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Tuve que asumir temporalmente el mando de su protectorado en su ausencia. Elegí Paso como nuestra base de operaciones, pues los rumores de toda la Extensión acaban llegando allí. Mis agentes indagaron en busca de información que guiase nuestra expedición de rescate, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Me alivia sobremanera renunciar al mando y devolverle su legítima potestad, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "In your absence, I had to temporarily assume stewardship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our base of operations, as gossip from across the Expanse finds its way there. My agents searched for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Tuve que asumir temporalmente el mando de su protectorado en su ausencia. Elegí Paso como nuestra base de operaciones, pues los rumores de toda la Extensión acaban llegando allí. Mis agentes indagaron en busca de información que guiase nuestra expedición de rescate, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Me alivia sobremanera renunciar al mando y devolverle su legítima potestad, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “您不在的这段时间，我不得不暂时肩负起王朝的管理工作。我选择落脚港作为我们的行动基地，因为整个科罗努斯扩区的流言蜚语都会传到那里。我的特工到处搜寻任何有关您的信息，确认我们的营救目标。如今，我终于能松口气，卸下指挥权，把它交还给您了，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "In your absence, I had to temporarily assume stewardship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our base of operations, as gossip from across the Expanse finds its way there. My agents searched for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “您不在的这段时间，我不得不暂时肩负起王朝的管理工作。我选择落脚港作为我们的行动基地，因为整个科罗努斯扩区的流言蜚语都会传到那里。我的特工到处搜寻任何有关您的信息，确认我们的营救目标。如今，我终于能松口气，卸下指挥权，把它交还给您了，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « En votre absence, j'ai dû temporairement prendre les rênes de votre protectorat. Comme toutes les rumeurs des Étendues finissent tôt ou tard par atteindre Castel, c'est là que j'ai choisi d'établir notre base d'opérations. Mes agents ont cherché tout ce qui pouvait nous aider à savoir où envoyer notre équipe de sauvetage. J'avoue que je suis soulagé de vous rendre le commandement, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "In your absence, I had to temporarily assume stewardship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our base of operations, as gossip from across the Expanse finds its way there. My agents searched for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « En votre absence, j'ai dû temporairement prendre les rênes de votre protectorat. Comme toutes les rumeurs des Étendues finissent tôt ou tard par arriver à Castel, c'est là que j'ai choisi d'établir notre base d'opérations. Mes agents ont cherché tout ce qui pouvait nous aider à savoir où envoyer notre équipe de sauvetage. J'avoue que je suis soulagé de vous rendre le commandement, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが不在の間、私は一時的にあなたの保護領の執政を引き受けなければなりませんでした。私はフットフォールを活動拠点に選びました。エクスパンス全域からの噂話がそこに届くからです。私のエージェントは、救出遠征の標的を指し示すことができるような、あなたの御身に関するあらゆる情報を探っておりました。指揮権を放棄し、あなたにお返しできることができ、大変安堵しております、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "In your absence, I had to temporarily assume stewardship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our base of operations, as gossip from across the Expanse finds its way there. My agents searched for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが不在の間、私は一時的にあなたの保護領の執政を引き受けなければなりませんでした。私はフットフォールを活動拠点に選びました。エクスパンス全域からの噂話がそこに届くからです。私のエージェントは、救出遠征の標的を指し示すことができるような、あなたの御身に関するあらゆる情報を探っておりました。指揮権を放棄し、あなたにお返しできることができ、大変安堵しております、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich musste in Eurer Abwesenheit vorübergehend als Verwalter Eures Protektorats fungieren. Ich habe Footfall als Operationsbasis gewählt, da Gerüchte aus der gesamten Ausdehnung ihren Weg dorthin finden. Meine Agenten haben nach jeder Erwähnung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gesucht, die uns hätte sagen können, wohin wir eine Rettungsexpedition schicken müssen. Ich bin extrem erleichtert, das Kommando nun abzugeben und wieder Euch zu übertragen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "In your absence, I had to temporarily assume stewardship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our base of operations, as gossip from across the Expanse finds its way there. My agents searched for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich musste in Eurer Abwesenheit vorübergehend als Gouverneur Eures Protektorats fungieren. Ich habe Footfall als Operationsbasis gewählt, da Gerüchte aus der gesamten Ausdehnung ihren Weg dorthin finden. Meine Agenten haben nach jeder Erwähnung Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gesucht, die uns hätte sagen können, wohin wir eine Rettungsexpedition schicken müssen. Ich bin extrem erleichtert, das Kommando nun abzugeben und wieder Euch zu übertragen, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Siz yokken geçici bir süreliğine protektoranızın idaresini üzerime almak zorunda kaldım. Enginlik'teki düm dedikoduların toplandığı Binliman'ı faaliyet üssümüz olarak belirledim. Ajanlarım, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden bahseden birilerini bulmak için her yeri aradı. Sonrasında kurtarma seferimizin hedefini belirleyecektik. Komutayı yeniden size devretmek, içimi rahatlatıyor Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "In your absence, I had to temporarily assume stewardship of your protectorate. I chose Footfall as our base of operations, as gossip from across the Expanse finds its way there. My agents searched for any mention of Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship that could point us to the target of our rescue expedition. I am greatly relieved to relinquish my command and return it to you, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Siz yokken geçici bir süreliğine protektoranızın idaresini üzerime almak zorunda kaldım. Faaliyet üssümüz olarak Binliman'ı belirledim çünkü Enginlik'teki tüm dedikodular oraya ulaşıyordu. Ajanlarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinden bahseden birilerini bulmak için her yeri aradı, böylece kurtarma seferimizin hedefini belirleyecektik. Komutamdan feragat edip size devretmek içimi rahatlatıyor Lord Kaptan."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
